text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO Speaker Pelosi this President is intentionally destroying this country,  if the world's so called smartest intelligence agencies don't see this then Covid-19 will be child's play if he gets back in office, each major person of power is strung up by Trump's including W. Barr...☹️
